mapper.sql: id, equipment, source, location, result, lec, class, measure, staff, create_id, qrcode
mapper.select: select equipment, source, location, result, lec, class, measure, staff, create_id from tip where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into tip (id, equipment, source, location, result, lec, class, measure, staff, create_id, qrcode) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{equipment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{result,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lec,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{class,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{measure,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{staff,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{qrcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
